# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  README analytic bug_128.cir bug_128.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_128.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_128/bug_128.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_128.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_128.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_128/bug_128.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_128/bug_128.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly")
endif()
